title: 04/09/2021 - HOUR 1 - Winning, NFL draft, LeBron
itunes:title: 04/09/2021 - HOUR 1 - Winning, NFL draft, LeBron
description:
Tom Brady is showing everyone how committed he is, Aaron Rodgers is not

It seems like only one QB is getting nitpicked in this years NFL draft

LeBron James is in a great situation since coming to the Lakers


Guest: Peter Schrager
